psalm.text:
[[Ps 98,1]]Sing to the LORD a new song, 
for he has done wondrous deeds; 
His right hand has won victory for him, 
his holy arm.

[[Ps 98,2]]The LORD has made his salvation known: 
in the sight of the nations he has revealed his justice.
[[Ps 98,3a]]He has remembered his kindness and his faithfulness
[[Ps 98,3b]]toward the house of Israel.

[[Ps 98,3c]]All the ends of the earth have seen
[[Ps 98,3d]]the salvation by our God.
[[Ps 98,4]]Sing joyfully to the LORD, all you lands; 
break into song; sing praise.
psalm.title: Psalms

gospel.text:
[[Mt 5,38]]Jesus said to his disciples: "You have heard that it was said, An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth.
[[Mt 5,39]]But I say to you, offer no resistance to one who is evil. When someone strikes you on (your) right cheek, turn the other one to him as well.
[[Mt 5,40]]If anyone wants to go to law with you over your tunic, hand him your cloak as well.
[[Mt 5,41]]Should anyone press you into service for one mile, go with him for two miles.
[[Mt 5,42]]Give to the one who asks of you, and do not turn your back on one who wants to borrow."
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew
